subsection.name: Add Dependencies
subsection.p: Make sure you have the forge Maven2 repository reference and dependency definition in the root pom.xml of your project.

div.source:
<repositories>
<!-- SNIP -->
<repository> <id>hst-versionutil-maven-repo</id> <name>HST Content Version Utilities Maven 2 Repository</name> <url>http://forge.onehippo.org/svn/hst-versionutil/maven2/</url> </repository>
<!-- SNIP -->
</repositories>
<!-- SNIP -->
<dependencyManagement>
<!-- SNIP -->
<dependencies>
<!-- SNIP -->
<!-- NOTE: You should set a property named 'forge.hst-versionutil.version' to a version of this plugin! -->
<dependency> <groupId>org.onehippo.forge.hst-versionutil</groupId> <artifactId>hst-versionutil</artifactId> <version>${forge.hst-versionutil.version}</version> </dependency>
<!-- SNIP -->
</dependencies>
<!-- SNIP -->
</dependencyManagement>

subsection.p: And add the following dependency reference into your Hippo SITE Web Application module subproject.
Now, you're ready to use the module!
